name: Grappling Gun Game
description:
Hey you! This is my first game made in unity, lightning is really bad and its just a grappling hook game. I know it works only for windows, I don't know for mac or linux.   In the end, the game its pretty buggy, so close the game and open it again is bugs come.

Music made by Evan King. Evan Kings Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

DISCLAMER

All code of the game DOES NOT belong to me, belongs to Dani, developer of the game karlson. It is not mine, i just tweaked it a little bit. Dani's youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIabPXjvT5BVTxRDPCBBOOQ

Ill be uploading a youtube video of the process in my youtube channel so if you want to check that out: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC72f4ul75wa-VBgtysdmHtQ?
